title: LFM Casual Games
body: Hi guys, I'm relatively new to League, I'm looking for ppl to play games with, just casually, I'm still lvling up my account and will be looking to get into Ranked mode asap. My deets are 'Flagg19' Cheers!

replies.body: I'll be glad to help you :) I still learning myself and have smurf around your level so dont have to worry about lvl 30 accounts :)
